name: Elderly Esquire
description:
Defense attorney Vin Arabull fights for justice in the courtroom!

Or at least, he used to.

Vin is long-retired, his law-practicing days behind him as he lives out his days relaxing at a cozy retirement home. But when a shocking crime rocks the facility, it's time for Vin to head to the bench once again!

  • Play as defense attorney Vin Arabull in this short visual novel inspired by the Ace Attorney series!
  • Point out the inconsistencies in witness testimony!
  • Meet new and familiar faces!
  • Play through the first case of a continuing saga, with a full expanded game coming soon!
